name: scrutiny
description: Scrutiny is a self-hosted S.M.A.R.T. monitoring system for hard drives that includes dashboards, alerts, and analytics for drive health tracking.

features.title: S.m.a.r.t. Monitoring
features.description: Tracks hard drive health metrics using S.M.A.R.T. data from smartctl

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Displays drive health, temperature, and failure predictions in intuitive charts

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Sends email, Slack, or webhook alerts when drives show signs of failure

features.title: Historical Tracking
features.description: Stores S.M.A.R.T. metrics over time to identify degradation trends

features.title: Multi
features.description: Monitors all connected drives including HDDs, SSDs, and NVMe devices

features.title: Failure Prediction
features.description: Uses S.M.A.R.T. thresholds and algorithms to predict drive failures

features.title: Temperature Monitoring
features.description: Tracks drive temperatures and alerts on overheating conditions

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Access drive health information from any device via responsive web UI
